articles.author: icc
articles.title: BCCI didn't approach Australians for coaching role: Jay Shah - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Secretary Jay Shah has clarified reports that the BCCI initiated conversations with former Australian cricketers for the soon-to-be-vacant India head coach job.
articles.content:
Ponting, who didnt say it was anyone from the BCCI who spoke to him, said the multiple conversations he had made him think about his career and life priorities.
"I've seen a lot of reports about it,… [+910 chars]
